actionDiceDefinition: These dice represent a character's competence, attributes, trained abilities, and any benefits derived from equipment or external assistance. They are rolled to determine the success or failure of an action.
riskDiceDefinition: These dice signify the inherent difficulty of an action, its intrinsic danger, environmental threats, or the character's haste or fatigue. They are rolled to ascertain the consequences of an action.
movementTagDefinition: This tag is assigned to abilities that involve changing position or manipulating physical space. Rules often interact with this tag to restrict or modify movement effects.
consumableTagDefinition: This tag is assigned to items that are used up or expended upon activation or after a certain number of uses. Once consumed, their effect is typically gone.
